snippet: European stars are well paid to compete for the continent’s top clubs, but in the United States, elite players only get a small stipend to participate in league play.
lead_paragraph: European stars are well paid to compete for the continent’s top clubs, but in the United States, elite players only get a small stipend to participate in league play.

headline.main: In Europe, Players Profit From Team Efforts
headline.seo: Chess: European Players Are Well Paid for Team Play
headline.print_headline: In Europe, Players Profit From Team Efforts
